desc: Usually contains configuration, or information you want to store.
Contains your Character's XML data.
Contains your Custom Events.
Configuration stuff.
Contains your Custom Events.
Custom NoteType Scripts (And adds them in the Charter!)
Where your Stage `.xml` and/or `.hx` file for your stage is located.
Scripts that run when States are switched to, or when loading a ModState!
This script runs all the time, above any state switching, and never deloads (unless you switch mods).
Contains your Character Spritesheet `.png` and `.xml` Animation.
Stuff usually found for global PlayState graphics.
Where your Character's icons will be located.
Images of your stage can go here, but it's not required.
Custom Languages support for your mod!
The language you want to edit / create
Where songs are located, along with charts, events, scripts, audio, meta, etc.
Scripts inside the `./songs/` folder will load for every song.
Supports `Inst.ogg` / `Voices.ogg` and suffixes like `-bf`. Also supports difficulties.
Scripts loaded for this specific song.
Custom Classes go here.
